# SAP Vendor Documentation

Reference materials from SAP official documentation for skill development.

---

## SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC)

**Developer Handbook v12.2** - Widgets Reference

This directory contains the complete SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) Developer Handbook v12.2, specifically the Analytics Designer widgets section.

### Contents

- **[planning.pdf](sac/planning.pdf)** - SAP Analytics Cloud Planning Guide
- **[scripting.pdf](sac/scripting.pdf)** - SAP Analytics Cloud Scripting Guide
- **[widgets/](sac/widgets/)** - Developer Handbook Pages 31-139 (109 pages)
  - Individual page PDFs from the Analytics Designer section
  - Covers widget components, properties, methods, and events
  - Reference material for custom widget development

### Purpose

These documents serve as authoritative reference material for developing SAP Analytics Cloud skills, particularly:

- **sap-sac-custom-widget** - Custom widget development patterns
- **sap-sac-planning** - Planning application best practices
- **sap-sac-scripting** - Scripting API reference and examples

### Source

- **Document**: SAP Analytics Cloud Developer Handbook
- **Version**: v12.2
- **Section**: Analytics Designer (Pages 31-139)
- **Format**: PDF (split by page for easier reference)

### Usage Notes

- These are **static reference documents** - not integrated into active workflows
- Use for research and verification when developing SAC-related skills
- Cross-reference with official SAP Help Portal: https://help.sap.com/sac
- Always verify current API status at https://developers.sap.com/
